title: Halo 3 ODST Typeface
content:
Anyone know the typeface used in the “ODST” portion of this logo?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Halo\_3\_ODST.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020807/http:/typophile.com/files/Halo_3_ODST.jpg) | 53.1 KB |
author: chipotoole

comments.content:
My guess is Handel Gothic, albeit a little squished.  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/search/handel+gothic/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020807/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/handel+gothic/fonts/ "http://new.myfonts.com/search/handel+gothic/fonts/")
Handel Gothic looks right, could it be Aero too?
The agency I used to work for did the Halo 2 print campaign and they used Handel Gothic. They may have changed it since then, that was several games ago.

Big deal man, who cares?

Jk, that helps a lot to get it from someone who actually worked with it, thank you Corey. I have Aero Plain in my suitcase and is almost a replica of Handel Gothic, so I may just use that and save some cash.

Looks to be about a 75% vertical scale btw.
